costTable.title: Cost
costTable.txtCost: Approximate cost of notebook server resources over the last 24 hours – summed values may not match total due to rounding

resourceTable.title: Notebook Servers
resourceTable.deleteDialogTitle: You are about to delete Notebook Server:
resourceTable.deleteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this Notebook Server? Your data might be lost if the Server is not backed by persistent storage.
resourceTable.tooltipWarning: Warning: a process has failed, trying again… (check 'kubectl describe pod' for more information).
resourceTable.tooltipError: An error has occurred, pod creation failed. Check 'kubectl describe pod' for more information.

volumeTable.title: Notebook Volumes
volumeTable.deleteDialogTitle: You are about to delete the volume:
volumeTable.deleteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this volume? This action can't be undone.

formConfiguration.txtConfiguration: Extra layers of configurations that will be applied to the new Notebook. (e.g. Insert credentials as Secrets, set Environment Variables.)

formDataVolumes.txtDataVolumes: Configure the Volumes to be mounted as your Datasets.
formDataVolumes.txtDataVolumesIf: *The Cluster Administrator has disabled editing this Section!

formGpus.txtGpu: Specify the number and Vendor of GPUs that will be assigned to the Notebook Server's Container.
formGpus.errorGpuVendorRequired: You must also specify the GPU Vendor for the assigned GPUs
formGpus.specsWarningMessage: Selecting 1 GPU will automatically set 4 CPUs and 96Gi of memory.

formImage.txtImage: Select the base software you want installed in your server. If you choose a custom image, it must be available in the DAaaS container registry.
formImage.errorImageRequired: Please provide and Image to use

formName.txtName: Specify the name of the Notebook Server and the Namespace it will belong to.
formName.errorNameRequired: The Notebook Server's name can't be empty
formName.errorNamePattern: The Notebook Server's name can only contain lowercase alphanumeric characters or '-' and must start and end with an alphanumeric character
formName.errorNameMaxLenght: The Notebook Server's name can't be more than 52 characters

formSpecs.txtCpu: Specify the total amount of CPU and RAM reserved by your Notebook Server. For CPU-intensive workloads, you can choose more than 1 CPU (e.g. 1.5).

formWorkspaceVolume.txtWorkspaceVolume: Configure the Volume to be mounted as your personal Workspace.
formWorkspaceVolume.txtWorkspaceVolumeIf: *The Cluster Administrator has disabled editing this Section!
formWorkspaceVolume.ckbNoPersistent: Don't use Persistent Storage for User's home
formWorkspaceVolume.msgNoPersistent: Your workspace will not be persistent. You will lose all data in it, if your notebook is terminated for any reason.

volume.errorNameRequired: The volume name can't be empty
volume.errorNamePattern: The volume name can only contain lowercase alphanumeric characters, '-' or '.', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character
volume.errorMountedVolume: The volume is already mounted to another notebook and cannot be currently selected

resourceForm.msgDefaultStorageClass: No default Storage Class is set. Can't create new Disks for the new Notebook. Please use an Existing Disk.
